description: BSG files can be loaded in Besiege to play the creations in the game. The files can be uploaded to BSG File Editor, which enables you to modify machines and vehicles stored in BSG files. You can also view and modify BSG files in a simple XML editor or text editor.
BSG files may be shared among Besiege users to load customized machines. BSG files can be loaded in Besiege by selecting "Load machine" in Besiege or placing them in the following locations:
